resources.string: This feature is available only in the PRO version of Android System

Please, take a minute to read what\'s inside this application. Keep in mind that some tools will not work without root permission and busybox\n\nBefore leaving a bad review on Play Store, if you face off any issue, problem or error contact us (gido.solution@gmail.com) and describe your problem!
- MIUI File Explorer with ability to enable root access
- LogCat allow you to explore system logs
- Anonymous Browser allow you to surfing the web with the transparent anon
- Framework installer allow you to install the XPosed framework required for customizing and using the app preferences module. Require root access and busybox

- Application custom preferences allow you to customize app preferences using Xposed app settings that allow you to customize apps DPI, Layout, font scale and much more. Require the compatible framework installed, root and busybox
- Benchmarks allow you to detect your device performance
- Permissions display in a detailed list all the android permissions and allow you to check wich installed applications use certain permissions. The red marked are the dengerous one!
- CPU and Kernel spy allow you to check detailed informations about your cpu voltage and kernel related infos
- The build prop editor is an useful tool to manual edit the system build properties. This tool requires root access!
- App backup allow you to backup and restore your application data. This tool requires root access and busybox installed
- Data backup allow you to backup and restore your personal data such as SMS, Call Logs, Bookmarks, Settings etc.
- Properties backup allow you to backup and restore your system properties files. This tool requires root access

- Zipalign application is a task that will optimize all your applications in system and data folder. Zipalign will increase the general performance and reduce the ram usage. This tool requires root access
- SQL defrag and optimization is a task that optmize your SQL databases such as contacts etc. This tool requires root access
- Application cache cleaner will clean the apps cache and will free some space on your internal SDCard. This tool requires root access
- Combines inside the Android Tweaker PRO tweaks, not yet finished. All the tweaked will be imported into this app as soon as possible. The tweaker requires root access in order to work properly
- Allow you to choose your country and overwrite the default gps config file. GPS Tune requires root access
- This powerful tool allow you to physically remove system applications. This tool requires root access
- Allow you to launch custom recovery action directly from your device. It requires a custom recovery like CWM or TWRP in order to work properly
- Font installer allow you to install the font you wish. Require root access!
"This copy of Android System Pro is not licensed"

This tweak will set the WIFI scan interval to 180 seconds instead of the default 60
Sets the behavior of the CPU while the device is in deep sleep
An ultra-low power state when phone is in idle
This tweak will modify the value of dirty_expire_centisecs and dirty_writeback_centisecs

What is the media scanner?\n The Media Scanner is an Android service that scans the internal and external memory of your device for media files and update the various databases that will allow the various apps such as music players and galleries to play them properly. Disabling Media Scanner will get, however, greatest results in terms of battery life and performance! But be careful: Primarily app such as the gallery and the camera are usually not affected by the media scanner, but many others (such as the acquisition screenshoots) yes (unable to save). If you encouter any problems, you can just come back here and turn it back on with a single tap.
Fine tune for your GPU.\nIt will enable some of the new build properties tweaks for ICS and JellyBean

Here you can install the Xposed framework. It is the base for modules that can change the behaviour and look of your Android phone. For more information please see here.
Clean up (complete removal of the framework)
Xposed module is not activated yet
This module does not provide a user interface
Xposed module list was updated\nChanges will become active on reboot
This module requires a newer Xposed version (%s) and thus cannot be activated.
Xposed is not (yet) compatible with Android SDK version %1$d or your processor architecture (%2$s).
Xposed has not been tested with Android SDK version %d, but it seems to be compatible. You can try installing it if you feel adventurous.
This module does not specify the Xposed version it needs.
This module was created for Xposed version %1$s, but due to incompatible changes in version %2$s, it has been disabled.
An Xposed module by rovo89 andTungstwenty. You can use this thread for questions or suggestions.
Tap on the font you wish to install!
The selected font has been installed, you need to reboot your device in order to apply the changes.\n\nDo you want to reboot your device now?

Android System font installer let you install with a single tap the font you like listed here.

When you tap on a font, a prompt message will let you choose the installation method. Keep in mind that if you select the wrong method your device will end in bootloop!

Owever the choose is not so hard. You just have to select your current Android ROM and choose between AOSP ROM or Stock ROM.
